original_text: You know that Christ only does what is right. So you should know this: Everyone who continues to do what is right has become a child of God.
korean_text: 너희가 그가 의로우신 줄을 알면 의를 행하는 자마다 그에게서 난 줄을 알리라

sentences.original_text: You know that Christ only does what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도는 옳은 것만 행하신다는 것을 너희는 알고 있으며

sentences.original_text: Everyone who continues to do what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 계속해서 옳은 것을 행하는 모든 사람은

sentences.original_text: has become a child of God
